a.n: Viols Sur Mineurs, Mon Combat Contre L'oubli

p.d: In 2016, Flavie Flament went public about being sexually assaulted by the British photographer David Hamilton, when she was 13 years-old. The French television presenter looks back at her battle to extend the statute of limitations for statutory rape and gives other victims an opportunity to speak out. Directed by: Flavie Flament, Karine Dusfour (France, 2017)
